verses.verse: And Israel<WH3478> abode<WH3427> in Shittim<WH7851>, and the people<WH5971> began<WH2490> to commit whoredom<WH2181> with the daughters<WH1323> of Moab<WH4124>.
And they called<WH7121> the people<WH5971> unto the sacrifices<WH2077> of their gods<WH430>: and the people<WH5971> did eat<WH398>, and bowed down<WH7812> to their gods<WH430>.
And Israel<WH3478> joined<WH6775> himself unto Baalpeor<WH1187>: and the anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> was kindled<WH2734> against Israel<WH3478>.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Take<WH3947> all the heads<WH7218> of the people<WH5971>, and hang them up<WH3363> before<WH5048> the LORD<WH3068> against the sun<WH8121>, that the fierce<WH2740> anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> may be turned away<WH7725> from Israel<WH3478>.
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto the judges<WH8199> of Israel<WH3478>, Slay<WH2026> ye every<WH376> one<WH376> his men<WH582> that were joined<WH6775> unto Baalpeor<WH1187>.

And, behold, one<WH376> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> and brought<WH7126> unto his brethren<WH251> a Midianitish woman<WH4084> in the sight<WH5869> of Moses<WH4872>, and in the sight<WH5869> of all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, who were weeping<WH1058> before the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>.

And when Phinehas<WH6372>, the son<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499>, the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548>, saw<WH7200> it, he rose up<WH6965> from among<WH8432> the congregation<WH5712>, and took<WH3947> a javelin<WH7420> in his hand<WH3027>;

And he went<WH935> after<WH310> the man<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> into the tent<WH6898>, and thrust<WH1856> both<WH8147> of them through, the man<WH376> of Israel<WH3478>, and the woman<WH802> through<WH413> her belly<WH6897>. So the plague<WH4046> was stayed<WH6113> from the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
And those that died<WH4191> in the plague<WH4046> were twenty<WH6242> and four<WH702> thousand<WH505>.
And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Phinehas<WH6372>, the son<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499>, the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548>, hath turned<WH7725> my wrath<WH2534> away<WH7725> from the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, while he was zealous<WH7065> for my sake<WH7068> among<WH8432> them, that I consumed<WH3615> not the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> in my jealousy<WH7068>. for: Heb. with my zeal
Wherefore say<WH559>, Behold, I give<WH5414> unto him my covenant<WH1285> of peace<WH7965>:

And he shall have it, and his seed<WH2233> after<WH310> him, even the covenant<WH1285> of an everlasting<WH5769> priesthood<WH3550>; because<WH834> he was zealous<WH7065> for his God<WH430>, and made an atonement<WH3722> for the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

Now the name<WH8034> of the Israelite<WH376> that was slain<WH5221>, even that was slain<WH5221> with the Midianitish woman<WH4084>, was Zimri<WH2174>, the son<WH1121> of Salu<WH5543>, a prince<WH5387> of a chief<WH1> house<WH1004> among the Simeonites<WH8099>. chief: Heb. house of a father

And the name<WH8034> of the Midianitish<WH4084> woman<WH802> that was slain<WH5221> was Cozbi<WH3579>, the daughter<WH1323> of Zur<WH6698>; he was head<WH7218> over a people<WH523>, and of a chief<WH1> house<WH1004> in Midian<WH4080>.
And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
Vex<WH6887> the Midianites<WH4084>, and smite<WH5221> them:

For they vex<WH6887> you with their wiles<WH5231>, wherewith they have beguiled<WH5230> you in the matter<WH1697> of Peor<WH6465>, and in the matter<WH1697> of Cozbi<WH3579>, the daughter<WH1323> of a prince<WH5387> of Midian<WH4080>, their sister<WH269>, which was slain<WH5221> in the day<WH3117> of the plague<WH4046> for Peor's<WH6465> sake<WH1697>.
